author: Special Correspondent
text:
Officials attached to the Flying Squad on Thursday seized 1,041 grams of gold jewellery that was being taken in a vehicle without obtaining permission as per election commission guidelines.

The vehicle with a security guard and another person on board was carrying gold jewellery for a jewellery shop at Pudukottai from Hosur when the Flying Squad team stopped it near the airport.

The valuables were kept in various boxes, official sources said and added that permission was not obtained for carrying it as per Election Commission guidelines and in view of the enforcement of the model code of conduct.
title: Flying squad seizes gold jewellery
